PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1994-17731994-10-250,  ,  EIC,  , 
PrecisAmendments to the CANADA LABOUR STANDARDS REGULATIONS which give effect to amendments made to the Canada Labour Code in 1993 in matters such as the system of modifying hours of work, vacation and general holiday standards, maternity leave or re-assignment, injured-worker protection and recovery of wages, as well as make a number of administrative changes which update or edit the text.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 1994-0668 Publication Date: 1994-11-16
Attachments
